snippet.title: Patapon 3 E3 Trailer
snippet.description: Devastate your opponents with attacks as Superhero Patapon in the third iteration of the critically acclaimed rhythm-based action/adventure.  Play campaign with friends, go head-to-head or take on a clan of other Patapon gamers. Customize your tribe with different weapons and abilities in the greatest portable adventure of rhythm and war.
